price: Na haiwi kwa wana-mji tulio uangamiza, ya kwamba hawatarejea,
arabic: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: Na haitakuwa kwa watu wa mji tulio uteketeza kwa sababu ya dhulma yao kwamba hawatarejea kwetu Siku ya Kiyama, bali hapana budi kuwa watarejea na tutawahisabia vitendo vyao viovu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waḥarāmun ʿalā qaryatin ahlaknāhā annahum lā yarjiʿūna
